title: [Health] Affection from a dog really is medicinal, according to a new study | Just 10 minutes with a dog may help reduce pain for patients in the emergency room

[Medicine] Transmitted HIV-1 is more virulent in heterosexual individuals than men-who-have-sex-with-men. Study suggests HIV-1 is more virulent when transmitted through penile-vaginal intercourse. N = 340,000
